testcase.name: Get specific user
testcase.system-out: Given Kestrel API client is armed with credentials..........................passed Given a valid user ID exists in the system..................................passed When I hunt for user details via GET /users/{id}............................passed Then the hunt should return status 200......................................passed

testcase.name: Get all users
testcase.system-out: Given Kestrel API client is armed with credentials..........................passed When I hunt for all users via GET /users....................................passed Then the hunt should return status 200......................................passed

testcase.name: Get all posts
testcase.system-out: Given Kestrel API client is armed with credentials..........................passed When I hunt for all available tags via GET /tag.............................passed Then the hunt should return status 200......................................passed

testcase.name: Get specific post
testcase.system-out: Given Kestrel API client is armed with credentials..........................passed Given a valid tag exists in the system......................................passed When I hunt for posts by tag via GET /post/tag/{tag}........................passed Then the hunt should return status 200......................................passed
